snippet: Brigham Young guard Haley Steed has come back from three torn anterior cruciate ligament injuries in her career, and now leads the Cougars into the N.C.A.A tournament as a No. 10 seed.
abstract: Brigham Young guard Haley Steed has come back from three torn anterior cruciate ligament injuries in her career, and now leads the Cougars into the N.C.A.A tournament as a No. 10 seed.

headline.main: Third Comeback's a Charm for Brigham Young's Steed
